name: Fragile3D
description:
Fragile3D is a very intense and challenging wave game. Try to avoid getting hit by the diffrent types of enemys and shoot them back.                              *☆*――――――――――――――――――――*☆* Diffrent Enemys: Red enemy: Normal. Yellow  enemy: Fast. Blue enemy: sticky. Green enemy: poison. Silver enemy: Tank.                              *☆*――――――――――――――――――――*☆* There's also upgrades on the map that spawns randomly. These upgrades will grant you boosted abilites.                              *☆*――――――――――――――――――――*☆* Boosts: 1. Strenght boost. 2. Jump Boost. 3. Speed boost.                              *☆*――――――――――――――――――――*☆* There is also health pickups that gives +20 health.  And coins that will be used for permanent upgrades.                              *☆*――――――――――――――――――――*☆* Permanent Upgrades: Weapon Speed. Weapon Damage. More Max health. Player Speed. Player Jump.                              *☆*――――――――――――――――――――*☆*                              *☆*――――――――――――――――――――*☆* Other features: - Save your progress. - Highscore.                              *☆*――――――――――――――――――――*☆*                                                    *☆*――――――――――*☆*
